Played this game to death on console back around 2011/2012, and just recently got it after acquiring a PC. Left 4 Dead still holds up to this day. The campaigns are still insanely fun, Versus mode has many laughs, and I've thoroughly enjoyed replaying it and trying to get all the achievements all over again about a decade later :)
